title: Compliance Operations Engineer NEW!
full_description: *At present, due to COVID 19, all employees are working from home/remotely at this time.*Our Mission: To actively connect people to their next great opportunity. Who We Are: ZipRecruiter is a leading online employment marketplace. Powered by AI-driven smart matching technology, the company actively connects job seekers with millions of businesses of all sizes through innovative mobile app, web, and email services, as well as partnerships with the best job sites on the web. ZipRecruiter has the #1 rated job search app on iOS & Android. Summary of JobZipRecruiter is looking for an Operations Engineer to join our Compliance Team. You will be working on a collaborative cross functional team that includes members of the Technology, Legal, and Product Management teams. Our Development teams are actively involved in building compliance with CCPA, GDPR, TCPA, and other regulations and laws.Being an Engineer at ZipRecruiter requires familiarity with UNIX/Linux, a willingness to learn, and to be an advocate for our compliance initiatives. We value self-starting can-do attitudes. You'll have a high level of ownership over your work and opportunities to expand your skills and knowledge in Compliance and Software Engineering.A great candidate will have excellent people skills. Kind, respectful interaction with both internal and external parties is an integral part of our culture. This position also requires clear and concise writing skills to keep everyone aligned via different channels. We are seeking a candidate with all of these skills who will also be sensitive and welcoming to a wide diversity of cultural and technical backgrounds that we encounter in our global business.Key focuses:Guide, support, and partner with Engineering, Product, HR and Legal on compliance initiatives and obligations. Own and drive individual contributions on compliance projects and prepare
